SmallRig is thrilled to announce the upcoming release of the SmallRig Rotating Side Handle with Trigger REC.

  • SmallRig Rotating Side Handle with Trigger REC for Selected Sony Mirrorless Cameras 3893
  • SmallRig Rotating Side Handle with Trigger REC for Selected Canon / Blackmagic Design Cameras 5235

Ergonomic Secure Grip for Seamless Camera Control: Engineered with an ergonomic design, our secure grip ensures smooth and effortless camera control, reducing hand fatigue during extended shooting sessions.

Built-in Shutter Control with Complimentary Cable: Featuring a built-in shutter control and an included control cable, you can easily start and stop recording without touching your camera, enhancing shooting efficiency.

One-Click Stepless Rotation for Fluid Movement: Achieve smooth camera movements at any angle with the one-click stepless rotation feature, enabling you to capture dynamic shots with precision and ease.

USB-C Power Output Supporting PD Fast Charging: Equipped with a USB-C power output that supports Power Delivery (PD) fast charging, it provides quick and reliable power to other devices, ensuring they’re always ready to use.

Versatile Accessory Mounts for Enhanced Functionality: Designed with 1/4″-20 threaded holes, a cold shoe mount, and a wrist strap slot, allowing you to attach accessories like monitors, fill lights, and wrist straps to customize your setup.
